channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Windows 10
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Windows 10

item.title: CVE-2018-1035|2024-08-05T03:44:11.973Z -- microsoft -- windows%2010
item.description: A security feature bypass vulnerability exists in Windows which could allow an attacker to bypass Device Guard, aka "Windows Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability." This affects Windows 10, Windows 10 Servers.

item.title: CVE-2018-0964|2024-08-05T03:44:11.911Z -- microsoft -- windows%2010
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists when Windows Hyper-V on a host operating system fails to properly validate input from an authenticated user on a guest operating system, aka "Hyper-V Information Disclosure Vulnerability." This affects Windows 10, Windows 10 Servers. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2018-0957.
